github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14201:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14201#issuecomment-1254534839

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

cyb70289 commented on PR #14201:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14201#issuecomment-1254781761

   Arm job is okay. But s390x CI fails as there's no `sccache` binary available for s390x.
   https://app.travis-ci.com/github/apache/arrow/jobs/583544355#L1933
   https://github.com/mozilla/sccache/releases/

pitrou commented on PR #14201:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14201#issuecomment-1254783204

   We need a way to disable sccache on some CI jobs then.

assignUser commented on PR #14201:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14201#issuecomment-1254883631

   Thanks for taking this on @cyb70289! I did not know that ubuntu-cpp was a multiplatform image used for arm and s390x too. Otherwise I would have added additional checks to the build script for priunting the sccache stats. We could check if one of the relevant envvars is set e.g. `SCCACHE_BUCKET`

cyb70289 commented on PR #14201:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14201#issuecomment-1255802396

   The sccache installation is skipped on s390x.
   https://app.travis-ci.com/github/apache/arrow/jobs/583665459#L1932
   
   Unfortunately we cannot verify the full build due to another issue.
   https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17715
